title: Jeremiah 45:1
text: THE word that Jeremiah the prophet spake unto Baruch the son of Neriah, when he had written these words in a book at the mouth of Jeremiah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, saying,

title: Jeremiah 45:2
text: Thus saith the LORD, the God of Israel, unto thee, O Baruch;

title: Jeremiah 45:3
text: Thou didst say, Woe is me now!  for the LORD hath added grief to my sorrow; I fainted in my sighing, and I find no rest.

title: Jeremiah 45:4
text: Thus shalt thou say unto him, The LORD saith thus; Behold, that which I have built will I break down, and that which I have planted I will pluck up, even this whole land.

title: Jeremiah 45:5
text: And seekest thou great things for thyself?  seek them not: for, behold, I will bring evil upon all flesh, saith the LORD: but thy life will I give unto thee for a prey in all places whither thou goest.
